transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Madam ji aapka IndiaMART ka maine package liya hua hai.

Customer: Ji aap company ka naam bataiye mujhe please.

Executive: Ha bataiye.

Customer: Ji bataye.

Executive: Kya batau?

Customer: Company ka naam bata dijiye sir. S.M. Traders.

Executive: Haan ji bataye sir.

Executive: Haan, ye maine aapko package le rakha hai 36000 wala.

Customer: Haan ji sir.

Executive: Haan, iska refund chahiye mere ko.

Customer: Refund kyu chahiye sir?

Executive: Sir kuch kaam nikal nahi raha isme. Are ek mahine me kaise kaam niklega sir, 7 tarikh ko aapka kaam. Mai bol raha hu mai sir, ha to mai 70-80% me koi, koi lead verified to honi chahiye. Kuch nahi jisne search mara aapne usme lead me dal diya aapne.

Customer: Sir ek baat bataiye na aap is tarike se refund maang rahe hain, kisne bola hai aapko refund ke liye sir?

Executive: Sir mujhe package agar diya ja raha tha to bola agar aapko kaam samajh me nahi aaya to package refund milenge aapke, yahi kaha gaya tha. 7 din me aapko kaam samajh me aa gaya sir?

Executive: Ha tu nahi aaya madam.

Customer: Kaise aa jayega sir, hum hi nahi bol sakte 7 din me to sir, aap kaise kar lenge judge sir. Abhi 7 tarikh ko account nahi kar sakte sir kyuki abhi to aapki SEO bhi dhang se nahi hua sir. Jab SEO dhang se hoga tabhi to cheeze aayegi na sir. Meri baat suniye aap lead to wohi denge na jo aapke paas hai available jo aapke show ho rahi hai aur koi bhi nikal ke aap denge mujhe.

Customer: Sir ek baat batao hamari, jo aapki, ek minute batao jo aapki buying lead aa rahi hai wohi to show doge aap mujhe koi aur bhi aa jayegi aapke paas.

Executive: Sir jab cheeze dhang se hogi to definitely cheeze alag tarike se bhi aayengi sir. Kaise me kaise aa jayengi buying lead to woh sabhi ko wohi show hongi. Kyuki aise aa jayengi jab aap apna lead purchase karoge proper way me to hamara AI pattern set hoga. AI pattern set hoga to usko pata chalega aap kis quantity me focus kar rahe ho, kis area me focus kar rahe ho, kis product me kar rahe ho fir uske according aayega. Nahi nahi madam aisa hai.

Executive: Ek bhi lead aisi nahi hai jo baat karke fir wo usme kuch man dukhta ho ki ha wo. Sir I agreed.

Customer: Mai mana nahi kar rahi hu, I totally agree with you. Mai bilkul aapse agree kar rahi hu lekin sir uske liye thoda patience rakho. Atleast do mahine service use to karo. Tabhi to business dikha payenge sir, patience se hi business hota hai. Itna high high karke business kabhi nahi hota hai sir. I understand I respect your money sir. Aapne paisa lagaya hai sir lekin aap mujhe bata sakte ho ki mujhe ye product ki inquiry chahiye mujhe ye aa rahi hai. Aap log lead verify karte ho koi lead verify nahi karte. Kisi ne search mara aapne us lead me dal diya ye ho raha hai.

Executive: Sir aap apni website theek karo fir agar aapko aisa problem hai to kyuki hum log sir aapki website jo catalog bana hai IndiaMART se usko theek karo fir kyuki hamare yaha to jo mai aap sahi bol rahe ho. Mere paas madam mere paas teen products the ab mujhe wohi bechne the. Ab wohi maine apne jo staff mere paas aaya tha jo mere se baat kar raha hai bahut confidence me laga tha usko bhi maine bata diya tha.

Customer: Sir mai samajh gayi hu aapko. Aisa to kuch nahi hai sir mai catalog theek kar dunga agar mere ko koi mere paas koi. Ha.

Customer: I totally agree with you. I did not said ki sir nahi hoga. Mai aapko simple itna kehna chah rahi hu sir. Abhi kya hua hai abhi dekho sir account use hua hai. To account ke jab start hota hai to company me jitne product aap logo ne add kiye hote hai wo sabke upar promotion chalta hai. Theek hai? Fir aapko dheere dheere jab aap uska buylead purchase karna start karte ho to system ko pata chalta hai ki is is beech product me se client kis product me jyada deal kar raha hai. Fir automatically us product ki lead aani start hoti hai. To mai aapko bas yahi keh rahi hu ki sir abhi to account dekho shuru hua hai atleast thoda to patience rakho. Ha ek mahine baad bhi agar aapko ye feel hota hai ki ha nahi aa raha hai aapka account 7 November ko hua hai aap atleast 7 December tak to wait karo sir. Ki ek mahine me hum kuch kyuki I understand jo cheez honi hogi wo ek mahine ke andar cheeze set ho jayegi. Lekin uske bavjud bhi agar hame aisa feel ho raha hai ki sir leads nahi aa rahi hai to waha pe problem hoti hai. Lekin 7 din me to koi bhi judge nahi karega na sir. Madam baat baat uski nahi hai. Dekhiye madam agar maine paisa diya hai to maine investment ke hisab se purpose se diya hai. Hain? To usme to koi mere ko harj nahi hai par lekin madam jo aapki lead aapki jo aati hai wo verified tak nahi hoti aap logo ke through. Wo khali kisi ne search mari kisi ne search mari aapne usko lead dal diya. Matlab usko phone karke ki yaar tumne aise karke IndiaMART me dal laga hai use jarurat to alag hi bhul jao aap. Use samjhana padta hai ki yaar tum bolo mai to dekh raha tha. Sir mai aapko bilkul wo keh rahi hu. Mai aapko ek cheez samjhana chah rahi hu is cheez ke liye sir ki hamare yaha pe jo lead hoti hai na sir wo is tarike se nahi hoti hai. Hamare yaha pe koi bhi lead verify nahi hoti that is true. Hum log kya karte hai aapka jo catalog hai isme product jab dalte ho aap usko proper way me hum log aapko samjhate hai ki aapne ye product dala isme relevancy hai ya nahi hai. Ye sari cheeze hum log set karke rakhte hai then after aapko usse relevant business aana start hota hai. Ab usme agar 19 20 kuch bhi galat hota hai to definitely you will get the wrong lead. Ab mai aap se wahi puchna chah rahi hu aap mujhe batao jaise abhi recently aapne kuch lead purchase kari thi sir isme kya feedback hai aapki leads ka? Aap mujhe thoda sa batayenge sir uske andar. Zero hai madam zero. Sir aapne baat nahi kari kya in logo se? Aapne kal bhi ek lead purchase kari thi broken rice and cattle feed ki Rohit ji se kya bola in Rohit ne sir? Ab aise particular to mere ko dhyan nahi ki kya bola. Sir thoda mai aap particular are sir suniye madam aisa na jaise hum bhi vyapar karte hai. Jaise koi baat nahi sir aapne ki baat kari usme 70 80 90% aise hain jinko yahi nahi pata humne humne dali humne dali bhi hai. Ha ki humne search kari. Mai maan rahi hu. I agree mai mana nahi kar rahi hu aapko do hafte ho gaye hain sir I totally agree with you. Sir lekin thoda sa aur wait karo sir mai fir bhi try karti hu kuch relevant lead aap tak pahunchane ki. Bas thoda wait karo ek mahina atleast agar nahi hoga hum refund karwa denge sir. Aisa kuch nahi hai ki jabardasti kisi ka bhi force pe lekin aapko dekho sir aapne business samajh ke hi paisa nahi wo aisa bhi hota hai ki kai baar wo refund ki policy to ek hafte me hi chalu thi. Sir hamari refund policy pure baro maase hai ki kahi bhi kabhi bhi aapko feel hota hai aap kabhi bhi kisi bhi time le sakte ho. IndiaMART koi choti company nahi hai jo band karke bhag jayega sir market ke andar stable hai hum log. To market ke andar aap itna PWD wale bhi choti company nahi hai. Kya? Vijay wala choti company nahi hai. Kaun? Chalo aap wo sab chodo aap mujhe aap mujhe batao karna kya hai mere ko. Sir aap proper buylead wagera purchase karo mai fir bhi aapka dekh leti hu kya kaise mai possible kara sakti hu. Aap ek kaam karna fir bhi mujhe thoda sa online aake time de dijiyega Monday Tuesday ke andar kyuki abhi to dekho Saturday Sunday hum logo ka off hota hai sir. To aap mujhe Tuesday bata dijiye kis time tak aap online aa jayenge ek baar mai aapka na ek catalog me sahi se details dalwa dungi to jisse aapko relevant business mil jayega sir. Theek hai. Theek hai to aap kis time aa jayenge aap mujhe wo bataye. Aap kar lijiye Monday ko kar lijiye call jaldi open kare aapka. Sir mai aapka na group bhi bana rahi hu abhi theek hai aapko fir bhi koi problem hoti hai direct mujhe udhar contact kar lena. But sir please mere ko aap se yahi request hai ki aap jo bhi lead purchase kare na ek baar usko proper read out karke kariye uski details uske proper kyuki dekho sir ek cheez mujhe aap bhi batao aap bhi ek business sir ek second ek second aap ek businessman hai aap apna number ya apni email id tabhi to denge jab aap kuch jarurat ki cheez le rahe honge ya sab jagah aise fill kar doge aap khud batao sir. Aap agar koi baat mai kehti hu aap chawal kharidne ja rahe ho. Aap suniye meri baat aisa hai jaise hamara jo kaam hai na uska season jab shuru hota hai wo sabse pehle hamare area se shuru hota hai all over India me. Sahi hai aur all over India me waha jata hai yaha se. Par jo hum aapse baat kar rahe hain sahi hai rate bhi genuine hai sab kuch bilkul perfect hai. Par lekin unko us cheez ka idea hi nahi hota hai. Matlab jo phone mila rahe hain ya dekh rahe hain usko us cheez ka utna idea hi nahi hota hai aur na unko ye hota ki ha hum dekh rahe the bas. Itna hota ki ha hum dekh rahe the. Koi baat nahi sir mai thoda sa is pe thoda sa aur kaam karte hain dono milke kar denge definitely result aa jayega. Theek hai aur sir ek cheez aur hai abhi to aap mujhe ye cheez bata rahe ho calls ka aur aap jo buylead purchase karte ho hai na? Hello. Haan ji. Sir lekin sir ek aur pattern hota hai jaha se hamari leads aati hai aapko direct inquiries bhi aati hongi aap wo check karte ho? Jo client samne se aapko karta hai. Wo bhi dekhte hain sir. Wo bhi dekhte hain. Ek aadmi sir wo sari dekho aapko pata hai ek cheez chhoti si socho sir sirf agar mai inquiry inquiry ki baat karu na sirf only inquiry to sir laal abhi tak is mahine me saat logo ne aapko samne se bola hai jo log ki hum kharidna chahte hain. To ab dekho abhi tak aap inko follow karte ho ye jhoot bolte hain aap se ki humne nahi kara falana dhakara lekin ye log to saat log wo hain jinhone aapko direct samne se ki hai aapne inke sath baat kiya? Usme se bhi maine ek se aage do se baat kar li aap se sir aaj. Sir aaj ek do mat karo mai aapko batati hu business pehle ye follow kaise karna dekho aap jo bhi buylead purchase karoge aapko jo bhi call aayega ya direct inquiry aayegi ye sab aapko phone ke mobile app me jaoge IndiaMART ke app hoga aapke paas? Aapko business inquiry. Hello. Product inquiry. Haan business inquiry me aayegi na inquiry me. Nahi nahi sir lead manager me aap jana lead manager me aapko sab ek jagah pe mil jayega buylead bhi calls bhi aur direct inquiry bhi aap un sab se baat karo ek baar. Me bhi kuch chhut bhi gayi hongi aap se un sab se aap baat karo ek baar. Ki aapne hame details diya tha sir kya hua mai isme deal karta hu. Theek hai aur mai aap se Tuesday connect karti hu sir. Theek hai? Hello. Sahi hai sahi hai. Theek hai and sir aapke paas ek satisfaction ka aayega agar aap meri call se satisfy hai to mai aapko aap please satisfy dijiyega koi bhi problem hoti hai aap mujhe dobara connect kar dijiyega and refund ki aap tension mat lo sir aap ek mahina mere kehne se use karo mai agar aapko fir bhi 7 December tak nahi business milta I personally refund your amount. Theek hai? And sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the package.

- No verified leads are being generated.

- Leads are not relevant to his business.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the AI pattern for lead generation.

- Executive asked to wait till December 7th.

- Executive offered to check the catalog details.

- Executive offered to create a group for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect on Tuesday for catalog update.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, catalog, ai pattern, verification
